headline: KKR (KKR): Revisiting Valuation After a Strong Month and Ongoing Earnings Growth
summary: KKR (KKR) has been quietly drifting after a strong month, and that sideways action is what makes the stock interesting here, especially given its mix of shrinking revenue and rising earnings. See our latest analysis for KKR. That recent 10.97 percent 1 month share price return has only partially offset a weaker year to date. However, the three year total shareholder return of 196.09 percent suggests the longer term momentum story is still very much intact. If KKR has you thinking about where...
